description: EHI Filter view for audit trail of historical (i.e. old data model) coverage verification changes on a coverage record.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage (CVG) record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VERF_HX_PRV_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
When the verification status is changed, this column contains the old status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: VERF_HX_NEW_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
When the verification status is changed, this column contains the new status.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VERF_HX_PRV_STAT_C_NAME

columns.name: VERF_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: When the verification status is changed, this column contains the user who caused the change.

columns.name: VERF_HX_CHANGE_DT
columns.description: When the verification status is changed, this column contains the date of the change

columns.name: VERF_HX_NXT_RVW_DT
columns.description: When the verification status is changed, this column contains the calculated next review date.

columns.name: VERF_HX_MEM_PAT_ID
columns.description: When the verification status is changed at the member level, this column contains the member's patient ID.

columns.name: CVG_PAT_EHI_IDENT
columns.description: Semi-colon delimited list of CVG ID, LINE, and EPT_ID. This combination is used to determine how the data should be filterd for EHI exports. A non-null EPT ID means that only that patient should get the data, and a null EPT ID means that all patients on the coverage should get the data.
